item.title: speck add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "People have their own reasons for dying. It might look simple, but it never is. It's just like a rock. What's above ground is only a small part of it. But if you start pulling, it keeps coming and coming. The human mind dwells deep in darkness. Only the person himself knows the real reason, and maybe not even then." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: speck add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: speck add a quote by Thomas Mann
item.description: "I tell them that if they will occupy themselves with the study of mathematics they will find in it the best remedy against the lusts of the flesh." -- Thomas Mann
